alert.note: Alert for Itawamba; Monroe (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 1:55PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Itawamba and northeastern Monroe Counties through 245 PM CDT... At 154 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Smithville, or 9 miles northeast of Amory, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Amory, Smithville, New Salem, Hatley, Sipsey Fork, Becker, Quincy, Bigbee, Cardsville, Turon, Splunge and Parham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
